message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly skewed, deal.  I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  Let's see if you think it's worth continuing.
I'll give you 40, but I think it's a good starting point. Your turn to improve it!
I'll raise your offer to 60/40.  It's still a better deal for you, and I'm willing to give up some ground to get this done.
